sentences.sentence: "I hate this classlessness thing, " Elizabeth said to Woodrow Wyatt, "it's so unreal."
sentences.translation: “我不喜欢那种没有阶级区别的东西，”伊丽莎白对伍德罗·怀亚特（Woodrow Wyatt）说，“这不符合现实。”

sentences.sentence: Classlessness may be modern and hip - yet birth determines destiny more certainly than 50 years ago.
sentences.translation: 无阶级论也许是现代而时髦的——但是，出生决定命运的现象比50年前更明显了。
